name: places/ChIJoVnM0-ZYwokRtDP6ONprQYE
formattedAddress: 47 E 77th St #216, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 47 E 77th St #216, New York, NY 10075, USA

originalText.text:
I have been a loyal patient of Dr. Patricia Gonzalez and dental hygienist Sidney for the past 8 years and I couldn't be more pleased with the exceptional care and service I've received. The teeth cleanings are not only thorough and effective but also incredibly painless, making each visit a breeze.

The professionalism displayed by the entire team is truly outstanding. From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with a warm welcome and can trust that you're in capable hands. They've consistently demonstrated their commitment to punctuality, as I am always seen on time without fail. This respect for their patients' time is greatly appreciated.

The office itself is immaculate and conveniently located, making every visit a pleasant experience. The cleanliness of the space truly reflects the high standard of care they provide to their patients.

In summary, I cannot recommend this dental practice highly enough. If you're looking for top-notch dental care, professionalism, and a comfortable environment, look no further. You won't be disappointed!

Update: also wanted to add that I had an amazingly simple and effective experience getting Invisalign with Dr. Gonzalez to treat a misaligned bite. Great experience

originalText.text: I've been a patient here for many years now and Sidney & Dr Gonzalez have always provided care with patience, humor and professionalism. I also received my invisalign treatment here. They navigate your insurance and make the process super easy. Recommend 10/10

text.text: I've been a patient here for many years now and Sidney & Dr Gonzalez have always provided care with patience, humor and professionalism. I also received my invisalign treatment here. They navigate your insurance and make the process super easy. Recommend 10/10

originalText.text: Today was my first visit with Dr. Gonzalez and I can honestly say that my experience was nothing short of amazing. Dr. Gonzalez really took her time to provide me valuable and experienced input in addressing my concern, whilst providing helpful recommendations. I feel like I (finally) found my dental home in NYC and am more than happy it is with Dr. Gonzalez :)

text.text: Today was my first visit with Dr. Gonzalez and I can honestly say that my experience was nothing short of amazing. Dr. Gonzalez really took her time to provide me valuable and experienced input in addressing my concern, whilst providing helpful recommendations. I feel like I (finally) found my dental home in NYC and am more than happy it is with Dr. Gonzalez :)

originalText.text: I have been visiting Dr. Gonzalez for over a decade. She is great and she also hires talented hygienists to help her. Dr. Gonzalez also has a fun personality, so the visits to her office are always very pleasant. Thank you Dr. Gonzalez!

originalText.text:
This is it! The Last Dentist Office you will ever need, you found it. Congratulations.
Patricia Gonzalez is the kindest most sweetest doctor I've ever encountered and is quite frankly the gold standard of how everyone in her field needs to be. You are in excellent capable hands here, literally.
